FuncDef:
The terminal echo synchronous command enables the synchronous display of user information on a terminal.
The undo terminal echo synchronous command disables the synchronous display of user information on a terminal and restores the default configuration. The terminal echo synchronous command enables the synchronous display of user information on a terminal. The undo terminal echo synchronous command disables the synchronous display of user information on a terminal and restores the default configuration. By default, user information is displayed in synchronous mode on a terminal.
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to display user information (such as commands and diagnostic information) on the terminal synchronously.
